original_title: 森光子を生きた女～日本一愛されたお母さんは、日本一寂しい女だった～
overview: Drama special "Mori Mitsuko wo Ikita Onna" follows the life of actress Mitsuko Mori and, in particular, when she 26 to 42 years old. Mitsuko Mori went through struggles to find happiness as a woman and an actress.
title: Woman Lived Mori Mitsuko
